project.description: Imports data dictionaries into HPDS format.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: destination_bucket_hash
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: the git hash of the commit that changed the data set

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash ######## adding pic-sure-resource build job to this ### Load Dictionary ETL Image #aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp s3://${stack_s3_bucket}/releases/jenkins_pipeline_build_${pipeline_build_id}/pic-sure-hpds-dictionary.tar.gz pic-sure-hpds-dictionary.tar.gz #aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp s3://${stack_s3_bucket}/data/${destination_bucket_hash}/javabins_rekeyed.tar.gz .
#tar -zxvf javabins_rekeyed.tar.gz columnMeta.csv conceptsToRemove.csv GIT_BRANCH_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_BRANCH} | cut -d "/" -f 2` GIT_COMMIT_SHORT=`echo ${GIT_COMMIT} | cut -c1-7`
cd tagging
docker build -t hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-dictionary:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} -f Dockerfile_hpds_dictionary .
docker save hms-dbmi/pic-sure-hpds-dictionary:${GIT_BRANCH_SHORT}_${GIT_COMMIT_SHORT} | gzip > pic-sure-hpds-dictionary.tar.gz
HPDS_ETL_IMAGE=`docker load < ./pic-sure-hpds-dictionary.tar.gz | cut -d ' ' -f 3`
cd ${WORKSPACE}
echo $HPDS_ETL_IMAGE ls -alh `pwd`
mkdir -p tmp/ mkdir -p local mkdir -p local/source mkdir -p output/ #cp columnMeta.csv local/source/ #cp conceptsToRemove.csv local/source/
### Pull data set to rekey. aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 3600 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws s3 cp ${managed_inputs} .
csvcut -c 1,2,3,8,9 Managed_Inputs.csv > inputs.csv
cat Managed_Inputs.csv
cat inputs.csv # pull dbgap dictionaries IFS=',' [ ! -f inputs.csv ] while read abv_name stdy_id stdy_type data_ready data_processed do if [[ "${data_ready,,}" == "yes" ]]; then
#if [[ ${stdy_type,,} == "topmed" ]] || [[ ${stdy_type,,} == "parent" ]]; then echo "downloading metadata for $stdy_id" aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/${stdy_id}/metadata/ local/source/${stdy_id}/rawData/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "${stdy_id}*.xml" --quiet #aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/${stdy_id}/metadata/ local/source/${stdy_id}/rawData/ --recursive --exclude "*" --include "*.json"
#fi else echo "$abv_name not ready for processing" fi done < inputs.csv
### Temp to get to this work ### non compliant and harmonized studies aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/phs002415/metadata/babyhug_metadata.json local/source/phs002415/rawData/babyhug_metadata.json aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/phs002362/metadata/csscd_metadata.json.json local/source/phs002362/rawData/csscd_metadata.json aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/phs002385/metadata/hct_for_scd_metadata.json local/source/phs002385/rawData/hctforscd_metadata.json aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/phs002348/metadata/msh_metadata.json local/source/phs002348/rawData/msh_metadata.json aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/phs002299/metadata/orchid_metadata.json local/source/phs002299/rawData/ aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/phs002363/metadata/redcoral_metadata.json local/source/phs002363/rawData/ aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/phs002386/metadata/stopii_metadata.json local/source/phs002386/rawData/ aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/phs002383/metadata/walkphasst_metadata.json local/source/phs002383/rawData/
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/phs002694/metadata/activ4a_metadata.json local/source/phs002694/rawData/ aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/phs002710/metadata/activ4b_metadata.json local/source/phs002710/rawData/ aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/phs002752/metadata/c3po_metadata.json local/source/phs002752/rawData/
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/hrmn/metadata/dcc_harmonized.json local/source/hrmn/rawData/
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/columnMeta/columnMeta.csv local/source/columnMeta.csv
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 3600 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
aws s3 cp s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/data/conceptsToRemove.txt local/source/conceptsToRemove.csv
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
### need conceptsToRemove.txt from another source after development is done
#### Execute dictionary import # volume mount pwd that contains original data files as /opt/local/source/ # mkdir -p "${WORKSPACE}"/output echo "docker run -i -v "${WORKSPACE}"/local/source:/local/source -v "${WORKSPACE}"/output:/usr/local/docker-config/search/ -eLOADER_NAME=DictionaryImporterUtil $HPDS_ETL_IMAGE" docker run -i -v "${WORKSPACE}"/tagging/local/source:/local/source/ -v "${WORKSPACE}"/tagging/output:/usr/local/docker-config/search/ -eLOADER_NAME=DictionaryImporterUtil $HPDS_ETL_IMAGE
cd "$WORKSPACE"/tagging/output ts=$(date '+%m-%d-%y') tar -cvzf dictionary_javabin_${ts}.tar.gz *.javabin
aws sts assume-role --duration-seconds 3600 --role-arn arn:aws:iam::736265540791:role/dbgap-etl --role-session-name "s3-test" > assume-role-output.txt
export AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=`grep AccessKeyId assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=`grep SecretAccessKey assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"` export AWS_SESSION_TOKEN=`grep SessionToken assume-role-output.txt | cut -d ':' -f 2 | sed "s/[ ,\"]//g"`
echo "aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp dictionary.javabin.tar.gz s3://${stack_s3_bucket}/data/${destination_bucket_hash}/" #aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp dictionary.javabin.tar.gz s3://${stack_s3_bucket}/data/${destination_bucket_hash}/ --quiet
aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp dictionary_javabin_${ts}.tar.gz s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/
aws s3 --sse=AES256 cp Missing_Dictionary_Entries_${ts}.csv s3://avillach-73-bdcatalyst-etl/general/hpds/javabin/
unset AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID unset AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY unset AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
